Source.Name: gdu
Source.Summary: Pretty fast disk usage analyzer written in Go.
Source.Description: Gdu is intended primarily for SSD disks where it can fully utilize parallel processing. However HDDs work as well, but the performance gain is not so huge.

Package.Name: gdu
Package.Summary: Pretty fast disk usage analyzer written in Go.
Package.Description: Gdu is intended primarily for SSD disks where it can fully utilize parallel processing. However HDDs work as well, but the performance gain is not so huge.
